    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Le soleil : source d'énergie</string>
            <string language="en">Sun: source of energy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne: Quelle von Energie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sol: fonte da energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sole: sorgente di energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ήλιος: πηγή ενέργειας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sol: fuente de la energía</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que les plantes et les  animaux ont besoin de l'énergie du soleil pour se développer et se déplacer.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that plants and animals need the energy from the Sun to grow and to move.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Animaux</string>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">énergie</string>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">source d'énergie</string>
            <string language="en">energy source</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croissance</string>
            <string language="en">growth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement</string>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plantes</string>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Betriebe und Tiere 
die Energie von der Sonne zu wachsen benötigen und zu bewegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as plantas e os 
animais necessitam a energia do sol crescer e se mover.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che le piante e gli 
animali hanno bisogno dell'energia proveniente dal sole di svilupparsi
e muoversi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα φυτά και τα ζώα 
χρειάζονται την ενέργεια από τον ήλιο που αυξάνεται και που 
κινείται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las plantas y los 
animales necesitan la energía del sol crecer y moverse.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tiere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
